casebody.data:
Submitted on record and briefs October 30, affirmed as modified, and remanded December 3, 1979 In the Matter of the Marriage of JEWETT, Respondent, and JEWETT, Appellant. (No. CC 78 587, CA 14847) 603 P2d 369 Ferris F. Boothe, Portland, filed the brief for appel-ant. Steven D. Gerttula, and Anderson, Fulton, Lavis & Van Thiel, Astoria, filed the brief for respondent. Before Buttler, Presiding Judge, and Gillette and Roberts, Judges.

PER CURIAM

*483PER CURIAM

The decree is modified to award reasonable attor-iy’s fees to wife in the trial court to the time of the ¡cree, and the case is remanded to the trial court for a ¡termination of what amount is reasonable.

Affirmed as modified, and remanded. Costs to ap-¡llant.
